body:
fixes #26420 

See discussion in the issue. With this we can bootstrap `clingo` from sources and link to a shared `libstdc++`. The downside is that we add a dependency that is not tracked by Spack's model (`clingo -> libstdc++`) so there may be other kind of failures we can't track at the moment.
title: clingo-bootstrap: add a variant for static libstdc++
